title: Can we combine the adkhar of fajr with morning dhikr? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in fajr prayer after we finish there are some pre some asgar that are shared between the after fajr prayer and the athkar of the morning such as ayatul kursi once here once here can we combine and just recite once for both yes such as after fajr once after fajr prayer once in the morning three each so if i read it three each would that suffice for the ones after fajr prayer yes and so on
